price: Bali unastaajabu, na wao wanafanya maskhara.
footnotes: Hakika Sisi tumewaumba wao kutokana na udongo unao gandana. Basi kwa nini wanaona ajabu kurejezwa tena wao?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
